description:
USN-3841-1 fixed a vulnerability in lxml. This update provides
the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 It was discovered that lxml incorrectly handled certain HTML files.
 An attacker could possibly use this issue to conduct cross-site scripting
 (XSS) attacks.

lxml.description: pythonic binding for the libxml2 and libxslt libraries

title: lxml vulnerability
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: lxml could allow cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.
